5UN.SI.summary: Sincap Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the trading of thermal coal in Singapore. The company operates through two segments, Coal Products; and Property Development and Investment. It also develops and invests in properties, as well as provides logistic management services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Singapore.

AUE.SI.summary: Golden Energy and Resources Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the exploration, mining, marketing, and trading of thermal coal. The company operates through Coal Mining, Coal Trading, and Non-Coal Business segments. It holds interests in five coal mining concession areas that covers an area of approximately 66,204 hectares located in South Kalimantan, Central Kalimantan, Jambi, and South Sumatra Basin in Indonesia; and owns forestry concession rights of 265,095 hectares in Kalimantan. The company also owns the rights to mine approximately 2.8 billion tonnes of thermal coal resources with coal reserves of approximately 1.0 billion tonnes. In addition, it offers management consultancy services. The company operates in China, Indonesia, India, South Korea, Spain, and internationally. The company is based in Singapore. Golden Energy and Resources Limited is a subsidiary of PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk.
